name: AutoDS
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget apt-transport-https software-properties-common && wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/20.04/packages-microsoft-prod.deb && sudo dpkg -i packages-microsoft-prod.deb && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y powershell && sudo apt-get install -y groovy
